title: The Key to How I Interpret Scripture
description:
I look at 3 stanzas in St. Ephrem’s book ‘Hymns on Paradise’, as well as some of my recent videos about Scripture and a short text from the Gospel of St. Matthew about St. Peter walking on water. Hopefully this video can give listeners a clue as to how I draw different texts together to think about symbolism in Scripture.

Hymns on Paradise: St. Ephrem the Syrian – Translated by Sebastian Brock: https://svspress.com/hymns-on-paradise-st-ephrem-the-syrian/

--------------------------------------

Related videos:
-The Symbolic Structure of the Beatitudes: https://youtu.be/ryNfmZgoJCA
- Christianity is Not Revolutionary: Parables of the Vinedressers and the Wedding Feast: https://youtu.be/Frh_f-wgxZE
-Christianity Rebukes the Powerful: https://youtu.be/WeH1i6s1BUE

More on 'Hymns on Paradise':
-The Garden of Eden as Cosmic Structure - St-Ephrem the Syrian: https://youtu.be/RXGdaJFIB8M

Image of Everything:
-Creating A Cosmic Image: https://youtu.be/P-tuhnl2mX4
-Designing an Image of Everything article, Orthodox Arts Journal: https://orthodoxartsjournal.org/designing-an-image-of-everything/
